pr_title: Run fetcher tests on a weekly basis

timeline.message: Run fetcher tests on a weekly basis
Run fetcher tests on a weekly basis

timeline.bodyText: Maybe its better to be more general and include src/main/java/org/jabref/logic/importer as the parsers are also essential for the fetcher and are a potential source why a fetcher test may break.
timeline.author: tobiasdiez
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,53 @@
+name: Fetcher Tests
+
+on:
+  push:
+    branches:
+      - master
+    paths:
+      - 'src/main/java/org/jabref/logic/importer/fetcher/**'

timeline.message: Broaden the scope of the fetcher tests
